short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to enable/disable hubspot chat display

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hubspot Chat Tipper is a powerful Google Chrome extension that allows you to easily toggle the visibility of Hubspot Chat widget on web pages. With just a click, you can activate or deactivate the display of the chat, providing you with enhanced control over your browsing experience.
